participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and empathetic, always trying to understand others' struggles.
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.personality: determined and resilient, pursuing goals despite personal challenges.
participant_2.background: i'm a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.

content.text: i m alcoholic   but i go to college during the week to become a lawyer
You are very young to be an alcoholic.
i m an alcoholic so it is very hard
I understand. I am recovering alcoholic.
i do not drink alcohol at all   i ve do many alcoholics in my family
Do you have mom and dad?
do you live with your mom and dad
No, I live along. I need free time to take my meditations.
that sounds like a really fun time   i was just meditating
Really? And had you seen something?
the news it is talking about that
Ok, I need to go, see you later!
you as well   i hope you do not feel too adrift
